keyMoments.title: Confronts Blueno
keyMoments.description: Luffy challenges CP9 agent Blueno at Enies Lobby, demanding Robin's return and declaring he doesn't care about the World Government.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Luffy's unwavering determination to save Robin regardless of the consequences with the World Government.

keyMoments.title: Breaks Through Blueno's Tekkai
keyMoments.description: Luffy's Gomu Gomu no Rifle attack breaks through Blueno's Tekkai defensive technique, shocking the CP9 agent.
keyMoments.significance: First clear demonstration that Luffy has grown strong enough to overcome CP9's Rokushiki techniques.
keyMoments.quote: You've changed since we last met!

keyMoments.title: Predicts and Counters Soru
keyMoments.description: Luffy demonstrates he can predict Blueno's Soru movement pattern and successfully hits him mid-movement.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Luffy's tactical growth and improved battle sense in countering high-speed techniques.

reveals.information: Can now break through CP9 Tekkai techniques
Can predict and counter Soru movement patterns

keyMoments.title: Confronted by Luffy
keyMoments.description: Blueno is challenged by Luffy at Enies Lobby. He explains that Luffy is committing a serious criminal offense against the World Government.
keyMoments.significance: Beginning of Blueno's battle with Luffy that will showcase how much the Straw Hat captain has grown.

keyMoments.title: Tekkai Broken by Luffy
keyMoments.description: Blueno's Tekkai defensive technique is broken through by Luffy's attack, shocking him as he realizes Luffy has become much stronger.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates that Luffy has surpassed the level where CP9's basic techniques are effective.
keyMoments.quote: You've changed since we last met!

keyMoments.title: Soru Countered
keyMoments.description: Blueno attempts to evade Luffy's Gomu Gomu no Gatling using Soru, but Luffy predicts his movement and hits him.
keyMoments.significance: Shows that Luffy has learned to counter the high-speed movement technique of the Rokushiki.

abilities.description: Iron Body technique that hardens the user's muscles to nullify damage, though it can be broken by strong enough forces.
Shave technique that allows the user to move at extreme speed by kicking the ground at least 10 times in the blink of an eye.

name.japanese: ウソップ / そげキング

keyMoments.title: Questions Oimo
keyMoments.description: As Sogeking, Usopp engages Oimo in conversation, asking why he and Kashii chose to serve as Marine guards at Enies Lobby.
keyMoments.significance: Sets up the revelation that will turn the giants from enemies into allies.

keyMoments.title: Reveals Truth About Dorry and Brogy
keyMoments.description: Sogeking tells Oimo that Dorry and Brogy are still on Little Garden fighting their duel and were never captured by the World Government.
keyMoments.significance: Exposes the World Government's deception and turns Oimo and Kashii into allies by revealing the truth.
keyMoments.quote: Dorry and Brogy are still on Little Garden, fighting their duel. They were never captured!

relationships.description: Sogeking reveals the truth about Dorry and Brogy to Oimo, exposing the World Government's deception.

evolutionMoments.description: Sogeking tells Oimo the truth about his captains still being on Little Garden.

keyMoments.title: Backstory with the Giant Warrior Pirates
keyMoments.description: Flashback reveals Oimo was a member of the Giant Warrior Pirates under captains Dorry and Brogy, and went searching for them after the crew disbanded.
keyMoments.significance: Provides context for why Oimo has been serving at Enies Lobby and sets up the deception reveal.

keyMoments.title: Captured and Deceived by World Government
keyMoments.description: Flashback shows the World Government captured Oimo and lied that they had captured Dorry and Brogy, offering to release them if he served 100 years as a gatekeeper.
keyMoments.significance: Exposes the World Government's willingness to use deception and manipulation to achieve their goals.

keyMoments.title: Learns Truth About His Captains
keyMoments.description: Sogeking reveals to Oimo that Dorry and Brogy are still on Little Garden and were never captured, exposing 50 years of deception.
keyMoments.significance: Shatters the World Government's lie and turns Oimo from enemy to ally.

relationships.description: Former crewmate under captain Dorry in the Giant Warrior Pirates.
Former crewmate under captain Brogy in the Giant Warrior Pirates.
Fellow giant who was also deceived by the World Government and serves alongside him as a gatekeeper.

reveals.information: Was a member of the Giant Warrior Pirates
Was deceived by the World Government into serving 100 years as a gatekeeper
Has been serving for 50 years believing his captains were imprisoned

keyMoments.title: Backstory with the Giant Warrior Pirates
keyMoments.description: Flashback reveals Kashii was a member of the Giant Warrior Pirates under captains Dorry and Brogy, and went searching for them after the crew disbanded.
keyMoments.significance: Provides context for why Kashii has been serving at Enies Lobby alongside Oimo.

keyMoments.title: Deceived by World Government
keyMoments.description: Flashback shows Kashii was also deceived by the World Government's lie about capturing Dorry and Brogy.
keyMoments.significance: Shows both giants fell victim to the same deception.

relationships.description: Former crewmate under captain Dorry in the Giant Warrior Pirates.
Former crewmate under captain Brogy in the Giant Warrior Pirates.
Fellow giant who was also deceived by the World Government and serves alongside him as a gatekeeper.

reveals.information: Was a member of the Giant Warrior Pirates
Was deceived by the World Government into serving 100 years as a gatekeeper

keyMoments.title: Appears in Flashback
keyMoments.description: Dorry appears in flashback as one of the co-captains of the Giant Warrior Pirates, whose century-long duel on Little Garden is the reason the crew disbanded.
keyMoments.significance: Connects the Little Garden arc to the Enies Lobby arc through Oimo and Kashii's backstory.

keyMoments.title: Appears in Flashback
keyMoments.description: Brogy appears in flashback as one of the co-captains of the Giant Warrior Pirates, whose century-long duel on Little Garden is the reason the crew disbanded.
keyMoments.significance: Connects the Little Garden arc to the Enies Lobby arc through Oimo and Kashii's backstory.
